main.java.pds

Class PhoneOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.pds.PhoneOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PhoneOperator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    PhoneOperator.java This class handles the phone operator operations: verify and create the customer information, create a new order for the specific customer.
    See Also:
